resources.string: Can not exec su You can click "sure" to download Z4Root.apk or downlod SuperOneClick on PC

Introduction:

 	 1.Before use The IME,you should use apps(like Z4Root ) to root the device.
 	 2.Make sure JNSIME is the current InputMethod.
 	 3.Touch mapping:
 	 	 a. Press search key to start the Mapping UI.
 	 	 b. Touch the area you want to map, and then press a key which you want
 	 	 to mapping with the screen area.
 	 	 c. If you want to mapping the Joysticks, you should touch at the center
 	 	 of the Virtual joystick,and then drag to adjust the area size. Press 
 	 	 search key to confirm you Mapping.
 	 	 d. Click the save button to save you Mapping.
